overview:
StÃ©phanie has four years of experience in PR, e-PR and social media. She’s specialized in high-tech and innovation.

Senior Account Executive who has a strong experience in the creation and the management of transversal communication campaigns: media & new media relation, analysts relation, conferences, etc. … especially in high-tech, software and multimedia sectors either for B2B or B2C solutions.

Sectors: Mobile Internet, Web2.0, digital entertainment (UGC, VoD & music), e-business websites, software and solutions for the enterprise.

Clients & references: Dailymotion, Autonomy, Boonty, Web2.0 Expo Berlin, MXP4, Kisskissbankbank, Climpact, AttractiveWorld, Augeo Software, Kwaga, Assuremieux, Clicmobile, eCircle, feedback2.0, Glowria, Goojet, digitick, Navx, Tellmewhere, Codeweavers, Barracuda Networks, Sofinnova Partners, Jaspersoft, UPC-Noos, T’n’B, e-sante.

Based in Paris, StÃ©phanie is a native French speaker and is fluent both in English and German.
